summary: Grove v0.6.0 brings a beautifully refreshed identity with our rebrand to Lattice, making the platform feel more connected and organic. We’ve rolled out a smooth new tenant onboarding flow and enhanced our multi-tenant routing so every blog feels right at home. You’ll also find a richer visual experience with a new vine-inspired landing page, more fonts, and a handy dark mode toggle—all part of our ongoing commitment to a caring, vibrant community.
